Does anyone have one that will work if ::ags is typed by any player?

item.title: I need help Coding my server
item.dc:creator: @Cyanidesuicide Cyanidesuicide
item.description:
@Cyanidesuicide wrote:

Hey guys,
I am new to making and coding private servers. I am using the Crazyfazescape 317 source. And I want to know how I can add a command that gives players A Ags when they type ::ags. I think I have a idea how to do it but I am not sure. Here is the code that I am using.

if (command.startswith("::ags") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(15333, 1); }

if (command.startswith("ags") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(15333, 1); }
Which one of those would it be to get Ags using ::Ags? If you can help me with this I would be very grateful. And If you can give me a better code that would be great.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help Coding my server
